SELECT
'MNU' || LPAD(TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(MAX(MENU_CD), 4, 7)+1), 6, '0')
'SCR' || LPAD(TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(MAX(MENU_CD), 4, 7)+1), 6, '0')
FROM MENU WHERE 1=1
AND SUBSTR(MENU_CD, 0, 3) = 'MNU'
